short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add new words to your Wooflang account on every website

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhance your vocabulary with the Wooflang extension to seamlessly add new words to your personal dictionary from any website you visit to transform your daily browsing into a continuous learning experience. Whether you're reading an article, watching a YouTube video, or scrolling through social media, simply activate the extension and click on a word. All words are stored in your Wooflang account where you can then study them.
